definition: suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
how can this be?/what's to be done?/what an awful mess!
what's the matter?/what's going on?/how could that be?/how did that come about?/what's it all about?
How did it happen?/What's wrong?/What went wrong?/What's up?

sentences.english: And i have no idea how the hell you get the impressions that Okinawans are pro-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你怎麼會有沖繩縣民親華的印象。

sentences.english: So, combustible ice is how come from?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，可燃冰是怎麼來的呢？

sentences.english: How about tidying up a bit in the sitting-room ?
sentences.chinese: 把起居室稍微打掃一下怎麼樣？

sentences.english: How do you really know what goes into store-bought baby food?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼真的知道什麼進店買嬰兒食品呢？

sentences.english: This time on the need to install streetlights, but also how streetlight control?
sentences.chinese: 這個時候就需要安裝路燈，可是路燈又要怎麼控制？

sentences.english: I hope I don't need it, because I don't even know how to load it.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我並不需要它，因爲我還不知道怎麼裝子彈呢。

sentences.english: What do you think about Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得聯合廣場怎麼樣？

sentences.english: And how would you deal with this brigand?
sentences.chinese: 那你要怎麼對付這個土匪呢？

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，許多家長怎麼也學不會正確地和孩子交談。

sentences.english: I have a job interview in an hour and none of it is coming off.
sentences.chinese: 我一個小時以後要去面試，這些玩意怎麼也洗不掉。

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有隻箱子特別重，可誰也弄不清是怎麼回事。

sentences.english: That's good. I was just wondering about how to spend my free time on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，我正在想怎麼打發我的週末時間呢？

sentences.english: What do you think about the two-party system in the United States?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲美國的兩黨制怎麼樣？

sentences.english: It's not like we're back in Ontario, how's that?
sentences.chinese: 這不像是回到了安大略湖，怎麼會？

sentences.english: Without you deny yourself, think about what other people live.
sentences.chinese: 不要自我否定，想想其他人是怎麼過的。

definition: suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
